text:
e="preserve">Vadivel Balaji (17 February 1975 – 10 September 2020) was an Indian Tamil television comedian and actor. He received the nickname Vadivel. Balaji was born in Madurai, Tamil Nadu.
He was well known for his works in "Yaaruda Mahesh" (2013) and "Kolamavu Kokila" (2018). He also took part as a contestant in the eighth season of the reality television show "Jodi Number One".
Balaji died from a stroke on 10 September 2020 in Chennai at the age of 45.
